name: Lightspeed
title: Utf8b8jyrq Alone On The Frankendance Floor
text:
Synopsis
Solana's ecosystem is experiencing technological evolution with Frankendancer, a new validator client, facing slow adoption due to MEV (Maximal Extractable Value) challenges, while simultaneously seeing innovative developer tools emerging.

Key Insights
- Only 12 validators (controlling 5.4 million staked SOL) are currently running Frankendancer, out of 392 million total staked SOL
- MEV represents approximately 25% of validator staking rewards, making efficient MEV capture critical for validators
- Over 93% of Solana validators currently use Jito-Solana client, which offers better MEV processing
- Anza (Solana developer shop) plans to push for Frankendancer supermajority on testnet in the coming week
- A new CLI tool called "mucho" has been developed to simplify Solana development, potentially lowering entry barriers for developers
- Jito restaking protocol added $80 million in total value locked during a 24-hour open deposit period
